name: Re-Run Dungeon
description:
You wake up in a dungeon, its cold, dark and your all alone. you Climb a ladder and then run down a path. Suddenly the world shakes and you back where you woke up. 

Keep trying until the you find the right path and escape Re-Run Dungeon.

Use arrow keys to move and space to jump. 

Music by: Cron Audio

Art by: Szadi Art 

Be careful of the edges of the platforms you might get stuck. Mash on up and down arrows and space to get un stuck #IAmAGreatGameMaker.
